data.actual_result: The screen goes black for a split-second and the text colour in the message bar gets inverted
data.expected_result: It's supposed to just change the language and not invert the screen
data.short_description: When I change the langauge on discord it goes black for a split-second and the text colour inverts
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to user settings - Scroll down to language settings - Change the language
